css_value: body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u{max-width:750px;min-width:initial;box-shadow:0px 0px 0px 0px rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-8,150,176,203),1);text-align:center;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p.maxi-text-block__content{color:var(--maxi-light-p-color,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-3,155,155,155),1));margin-bottom:0px;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p{color:var(--maxi-light-link,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-4,255,74,23),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p:hover{color:var(--maxi-light-link-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p:active{color:var(--maxi-light-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p:active span{color:var(--maxi-light-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p:visited{color:var(--maxi-light-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p:visited span{color:var(--maxi-light-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u.block-editor-block-list__block a p:visited{color:var(--maxi-light-link,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-4,255,74,23),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u a p:visited:hover{color:var(--maxi-light-link-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p a{color:var(--maxi-light-link,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-4,255,74,23),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p a:hover{color:var(--maxi-light-link-hover,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p a:active{color:var(--maxi-light-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p a:active span{color:var(--maxi-light-link-active,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p a:visited{color:var(--maxi-light-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p a:visited span{color:var(--maxi-light-link-visited,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-6,201,52,10),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u.block-editor-block-list__block p a:visited{color:var(--maxi-light-link,rgba(var(--maxi-light-color-4,255,74,23),1));}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u p ease;}body.maxi-blocks--active #text-maxi-d9becf1c-u .maxi-text-block--link span{transition:color 0.3s 0s ease;}
